activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: This mason always w'or'ks carefully on the wall.
A small b'ir'd is near the scaffold.
He often uses the gas b'ur'ner to heat the bitumen.
The chief engineer always draws the c'ur've with the red pencil.

activity_2.focus: Simple Present - third person singular , Nationalities

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the capital cities to the nationalities.
රාජධානී නගර ජාතිකත්වයන්ට ගැලපෙන්න.
மாநகரங்களையும் தேசியத்துவங்களையும் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
example_dialogues.text_h: He eats Sri Lankan food, he watches Sri Lankan movies, and he listens to Sri Lankan news.

example_dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
example_dialogues.text_h: She eats Chinese food, she watches Chinese movies, and she listens to Chinese news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats Japanese food, she watches Japanese movies, and she listens to Japanese news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats Russian food, he watches Russian movies, and he listens to Russian news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats Omani food, he watches Omani movies, and he listens to Omani news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats Pakistani  food,  she watches Pakistani movies, and she listens to Pakistani news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does he do every day?
dialogues.text_h: He eats German food, he watches German movies, and he listens to German news.

dialogues.text_g: Tell me, what does she do every day?
dialogues.text_h: She eats French food, she watches French movies, and she listens to French news.

activity_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

activity_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

examples.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a building contractor?
options: He oversees the installation of concrete beams.
He polishes the concrete beams.
He washes the concrete beams.
examples.answer: He oversees the installation of concrete beams.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a building contractor?
options: He negotiates contracts and completes them on time.
He paints contracts and delivers machinery.
He dismantles contracts and completes payment.
content.answer: He negotiates contracts and completes them on time.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a building contractor?
options: He inspects the alignment of steel frameworks.
He decorates the alignment of steel frameworks.
He damages the alignment of steel frameworks.
content.answer: He inspects the alignment of steel frameworks.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a building contractor?
options: He orders construction materials.
He breaks construction materials.
He hides construction materials.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a building contractor?
options: He supervises the use of safety harnesses on the site.
He dismantles the safety harnesses for the workers.
He ignores the safety harnesses during inspections.
content.answer: He supervises the use of safety harnesses on the site.

content.sentence: Which sentence best describes the job of a building contractor?
options: He schedules the excavation and foundation work.
He forgets the excavation and foundation work.
He decorates the excavation and foundation work.
content.answer: He schedules the excavation and foundation work.

activity_b.text: He oversees the installation of concrete beams.
He schedules the excavation and foundation work.
He supervises the use of safety harnesses on the site.
He orders construction materials.
He inspects the alignment of steel frameworks.
He negotiates contracts and completes them on time.

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_b.text:
Listen.
கேளுங்கள்.
සවන් දෙන්න.

activity_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_d.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: What does Kamal do at the beginning of the day?
Questions.answer: He checks the duty chart and prepares his tools.
options: He checks the duty chart and prepares his tools.
He paints the finished wall.
He drives the cement mixer.

Questions.question: What tool does he use to measure the height of the wall?
options: A wheelbarrow.
A spirit level.
A hammer.

Questions.question: What does he often do with the hammer and chisel?
options: He paints the scaffolding.
He cuts blocks.
He mixes water.

Questions.question: Where does he record the progress of the project?
options: On the wall.
In the mixing bucket.
In the site log.

Questions.question: What does Kamal always do before leaving?
Questions.answer: He locks the storeroom and hands over the keys.
options: He forgets to clean the site.
He leaves the bricks in the open.
He locks the storeroom and hands over the keys.

activity_b.text: Kamal is a trainee in the construction workshop.
He works in the masonry section every day.
He usually begins his tasks at eight o’clock in the morning.
He checks the duty chart, prepares his trowel and measuring tape, and organizes the wheelbarrow with cement bags.
He always follows the instructions from his supervisor carefully.
Kamal lays bricks in straight lines and spreads mortar with the trowel.
He measures the height of the wall with a spirit level.
He often cuts blocks with the hammer and chisel.
He never forgets to check the alignment, because accuracy is very important.
He mixes sand, cement, and water in the correct ratio, and he fills the joints properly.
During each project, Kamal inspects the scaffolding, secures the ladders, and places the safety signs.
He usually carries bricks to the site and arranges them neatly near the wall.
He checks the quality of the materials and rejects any damaged bricks.
He writes the progress in the site log and shows it to his instructor.
At the end of the day, Kamal cleans the tools and washes the mixing buckets.
He stacks the leftover bricks in the storage area.
He always clears the site and removes waste materials.
He never forgets to lock the storeroom and hand over the keys.
Kamal enjoys his training because he learns useful skills and feels proud of his work.

activity_c.text: Kamal works in the masonry section every day.
He checks the duty chart, prepares his trowel and measuring tape, and organizes the wheelbarrow with cement bags.
Kamal lays bricks in straight lines and spreads mortar with the trowel.
He measures the height of the wall with a spirit level.
He never forgets to check the alignment, because accuracy is very important.
He mixes sand, cement, and water in the correct ratio, and he fills the joints properly.
During each project, Kamal inspects the scaffolding, secures the ladders, and places the safety signs.
He usually carries bricks to the site and arranges them neatly near the wall.
He checks the quality of the materials and rejects any damaged bricks.
He writes the progress in the site log and shows it to his instructor.
He always clears the site and removes waste materials.
He never forgets to lock the storeroom and hand over the keys.
